title: Slow Cooker Balsamic Pork Roast
directions: Place pork roast in your slow cooker (fat side up). In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients. Pour over the pork roast.
Cook for 6-8 hours on low setting. Ladle balsamic sauce on top of roast before serving.
ingredients: 1 (3 pound) boneless center cut pork roast
